definition: Grouping category for BreadMachine, IceCreamMaker, PastaMaker...

positive_examples: I bought a new bread machine to make fresh loaves every morning.
The ice cream maker churned for twenty minutes before the dessert was ready.
She used her pasta maker to create homemade fettuccine for dinner.
The popcorn maker filled the bowl with perfectly popped kernels.
His rice cooker automatically switches to warm mode when the rice is done.
We grilled sandwiches in the sandwich maker for a quick lunch.
negative_examples: The food processor chopped vegetables for the salad.
She heated leftovers in the microwave oven.
The stand mixer whipped cream for the cake frosting.
He grilled chicken on the outdoor barbecue grill.
The slow cooker simmered the stew all day long.
They used the blender to make a fruit smoothie.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FoodProcessor, Microwave, StandMixer, SlowCooker, Blender
